name: 1943 Berlin Blitz
description: Join a Lancaster bomber crew during a raid over Berlin in World War Two.
minimum_requirements: OS: 7, 8.1, 10 Processor: Intel® i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 equivalent Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 970 / AMD Radeon™ R9 290 equivalent Storage: 3 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: 7, 8.1, 10 Processor: Intel® i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 equivalent Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 970 / AMD Radeon™ R9 290 equivalent Storage: 3 GB available space
